column2: Total revenue and total passenger trips
not available for a specific reference period
On August 1, 2018, certain data points have been suppressed because of issues with data quality for May 2018.
The sampled companies included in this survey account for at least 75% of provincial revenues for Canadian urban and inter-city transit.
For data prior to January 2017, please refer to CANSIM table 408-0004.

This table currently includes national (both revenues and passenger trips) and regional (only revenues) urban transit statistics. At a future date, additional regional urban transit and national intercity statistics may be published.
On May 5, 2017, the data have been corrected for reference period January 2017.
